exposurecontrol: Automatic, Interlocking rage (ISO 800): LV 10.5 to LV 15
weight: 610 g (without batteries, strap, film pack, and close-up lens)
liquidcrystaldisplaylcd: Exposure counter (number of unexposed films); shooting range index; lighten-darken control index; fill-in flash
flash: Built-in electronic flash; 0.2-2 s recycle time; with flash charging lamp (red); forced firing possible
lens: Move in/out type Lens; 2 components, 2 elements
others: With film pack confirmation window; with strap and close-up lens
shutterrelease: Programmed electronic shutter release, 1/64 - 1/200 s shutter speeds
viewfinder: Inverted Galilean finder 0.52x with target spot
